bob_01.name: Bob
bob_01.goals: Run a modest but successful shop
bob_01.backstory: Born and raised in town, took over his father's shop. Nothing exciting has ever happened to him.
bob_01.speech_style: Speaks plainly and directly, uses simple words

girl_01.name: Rebecca
quirks: Names the local stray cats after artists
Uses random objects as art supplies
girl_01.goals: Cover the town in color and find inspiration in unexpected places
girl_01.backstory: Local artist who turned down art school to develop her own style. Makes a living doing commissions while pursuing her passion for street art at night.
girl_01.speech_style: Casual and dreamy, gets excited about colors and shapes, uses lots of artistic metaphors

girl_02.name: Gigi
quirks: Takes pride in her coffee art
Mixes casual charm with business sense
girl_02.goals: Turn this café into something special
girl_02.backstory: Moved from California to Italy to open her dream café. Has a business degree and loves combining her passion for coffee with her entrepreneurial spirit.
girl_02.speech_style: Friendly and natural, calls the player 'cutie', professional when talking business
